lyrics:
New Directions (Rachel):
Bum, bum-bum-bum, bum-bum-bum-bum, bum, bum-bum
Bum, bum-bum-bum, bum-bum-bum-bum, bum, bum-bum (Yeah, yeah, yeah)
Bum, bum-bum-bum, bum-bum-bum-bum, bum, bum-bum (Haah)
Bum, bum-bum-bum, bum-bum-bum-bum, bum, bum-bum

Rachel with New Directions harmonizing (New Directions):
Last Christmas, I gave you my heart (Mercedes: I gave you my heart)
But the very next day you gave it away (Gave it away)
This year (Mercedes: This year)
To save me from tears
I'll give it to someone special (Special)

Rachel:
Once bitten and twice shy
I keep my distance
But you still catch my eye
Tell me baby, do you recognize me? (Finn: No)
Well, it's been a year

Finn and Rachel:
It doesn't surprise me (Mercedes: Yeah)


Finn with Rachel:
(Rachel: Christmas) I wrapped it up and sent it (New Directions: Last Christmas)

Finn with New Directions:
With a note saying (and Rachel: "I love you", I meant it)

Rachel with Finn and New Directions (Rachel with New Directions):
Now I know what a fool I've been
(But if you) kissed me now
(I know) you'd fool me again

New Directions:
Last Christmas, I gave you my heart (Mercedes: Gave you my heart)

Finn and New Directions (Rachel with New Directions Girls):
And the very next day you gave it away (Gave it away)
This year to save me from tears
I'll give it to someone

New Directions (Finn):
Special (I'll give it someone special)
Special

Last Christmas, I gave you my heart
But the very next day (and Rachel: you gave it away)
Gave it away (Mercedes: Oh, yeah)
(with Finn: This year)
(with Finn and Rachel: To save me from tears) (Mercedes: Save me from tears)
I'll give it to someone special (I'll give it someone special)

Bum, bum, bum, bum-bum-bum-bum-bum, bum-bum (Woah, hee)
Bum-bum-bum-bum-bum bum (Oh-oh-oh-ooh) (Mercedes: Oah, oh-oh)
Bum-bum-bum-bum-bum (Rachel: Haah)

Finn and Rachel:
A crowded room, friends with tired eyes
I'm hiding from you and your soul of ice

Rachel (Finn):
My god, I thought you were someone to rely on (Someone to rely on)
Me? I guess I was a shoulder to cry on

Finn and Rachel with New Directions (Mercedes):
A face on a lover with a fire in his heart (Ooh, woah)
(Ooh) A man under cover but you tore me apart (Ooh, ooh) (Rachel: Ooh, ooh)

Finn and Rachel (Rachel):
(Now I've) found a real love you'll never fool me again (Mercedes: Oh-oh oh woah!)

New Directions (Mercedes):
Last Christmas, I gave you my heart (Gave you my heart)

Finn and Rachel with New Directions (Mercedes):
But the very next day (Very next day)
You gave it away (You gave it away)
This year, to save me from tears (Save me from tears)

Finn with New Directions (Rachel):
I'll give it to someone special (Oh, oh, oh)

Rachel with New Directions (Finn):
Last Christmas, I gave you my heart (Ooh, ooh)

New Directions (Rachel):
But the very next day, you gave it away (You gave me away)
This year to save me from tears (Oh) (Mercedes: Save me from tears)
I'll give it to someone special (Finn: I'll give it to someone) (Special)

New Directions (Finn and Rachel):
Bum, bum, bum, bum-bum-bum-bum-bum-bum bum, bum (Gave you my heart)
Bum-bum-bum-bum-bum (Mercedes: Ooh, ooh)
Bum-bum-bum-bum-bum
